subtitle: Perfect for when you have the whole family for Sunday dinner.

method.text: Weigh the joint of pork and calculate the cooking time allowing 25-30 min per 500 g.
Carefully score the skin and fat of the pork evenly with a sharp knife. Brush the pork with the oil then evenly sprinkle on the salt. Rub this mixture into the surface.
Place the pork in a roasting pan and cook in oven for allocated time.
20 min before the end of the cooking time, slice the apples thickly. Heat the honey, butter and lemon juice together in a frying pan. Add the apple slices and heat gently for a few min.
To serve, arrange the apple slices around the roast pork.

title: Somerset roast pork
